name: s2fv0
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cs2(c0, c2), nat0), c0))

stmt.origin: cats1fv(c0, c1, cs2(c0, c2), nat0, cs1(c0), c2, nat1)
stmt.pretty: cats1fv(c0, c1, <" c0 . c2 ">, nat0, <" c0 ">, c2, nat1)

|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cs2(c0, c2), nat0), c0))

-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cs1(c0), nat0), c0))
-| wcel(nat0, cn0)
-| wbr(nat0, clt, nat1)
